text: I'd come out of the army after five years as a medic. I was a medical administrator and we ran hospitals, and I was a Captain in the army at the end, in 1945.
author: Eli Wallach

text: We also have a program in place for low income people. A family of four making $26,000 a year can receive medical coverage, irrespective of citizenship or what documents.
author: George Pataki

text: If someone lives in New York, he's a New Yorker - they are entitled to the best medical system in the world.
author: George Pataki

text: The World Health Organisation has a lot of its medical experts sitting in Geneva while hospitals in Africa have no drugs and desperate patients are forced to seek medication on the black market.
author: Pauline Hanson

text: Listening to medical facts was not enough. People wanted one hundred percent guarantees.
author: Ryan White
